code: import React from'react';import{flatDeep,slugify,containsObject}from'../../../utils';import BlogListData from"../../../data/blog/BlogList.json";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SidebarTag=function SidebarTag(){var tags=BlogListData.map(function(item){return item.tags;});var singleTagArray=flatDeep(tags);var tagsData=[];singleTagArray.forEach(function(tag){var obj={title:tag.trim(),slug:slugify(tag)};var objIndex=containsObject(obj,tagsData);if(objIndex!==-1){tagsData[objIndex]={title:tag.trim(),slug:slugify(tag)};}else{tagsData.push(obj);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"tagcloud",children:tagsData.map(function(tag){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/tag/".concat(tag.slug),children:tag.title},tag.slug);})});};export default SidebarTag;
